title: CURATED AIR
description: CURATED AIR - is an extensive sound library containing 184 unique files of Air (Aerosol, Compressed, Carbonated, Vacuum, Etc.) in varying environments and conditions.
longDescription: CURATED AIR - is an extensive sound library containing 184 unique files of Air (Aerosol, Compressed, Carbonated, Vacuum, Etc.) in varying environments and conditions ranging from plungers and suction cups, spray cans and bottles to vacuum cleaners, vent systems and air compressors. All of our libraries comply with the Universal Category System metadata naming convention standard. Files are presented in 44.1 kHz / 16 bit (VIDEO GAME).
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  184 Unique .wav files of Air in various environments and conditions.
  •  Universal Category System metadata file naming standard.
  •  Royalty-Free.

Number of Audio Waves: 184

Number of Audio Cues: 184

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 96

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mYHTK7be756g2kOuk9ywL18Ym2gyXrK3/view?usp=share_link

Demo: https://soundcloud.com/sound-assets/curated-air-demo?si=9e0b692eb43f4aa4840bdead681c10c3&utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing
